changeSet.createView: SELECT base_table.id, s.name AS service, pc.name AS parent, cc.name AS child, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, base_table.version FROM status_code_sequencing base_table JOIN existential s ON base_table.service = s.id JOIN existential pc ON base_table.parent = pc.id JOIN existential cc ON base_table.child = cc.id JOIN existential up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN workspace_authorization wa ON base_table.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN existential w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
